solution.text:
Total surface area \(= _{{6*(j**2)}}_= 6 (side)^2\)
\(\Rightarrow\) Length of side = \( \left(\sqrt {\frac {_{{6*(j**2)}}_}{6}} \right) = _{j}_ cm\)

content.text: A closed box in the shape of a cube has a total outer surface area of _{{6*(j**2)}}_ \(cm^2.\) What is the length of its side in centimetres?
